ProductInfo.Features:
This unlocked cell phone is compatible with GSM carriers like AT&T; and T-Mobile. Not all carrier features may be supported.
U.S. tri-band GSM cell phone compatible with 850/1800/1900 frequencies and US 3G compatibility via 850/1900 UMTS/HSDPA plus GPRS/EDGE capabilities
1.3-megapixel digital camera with 8x digital zoom; digital audio/video player
Bluetooth stereo music; MicroSD memory expansion; organizer; speaker-independent voice controls
Up to 3 hours of talk time, up to 290 hours (12+ days) of standby time
ProductInfo.Name: Motorola RAZR V3XX Unlocked Phone with 3G, Music/Video Player and MicroSD Slot--International Version with No Warranty--Black
